resources: Cyanogen Update Tracker Update Tracker Update Close Cyanogen OS Version: %1$s There is no official information about the new features this update provides. Usually, such an update provides bug fixes, performance enhancements, and / or critical security updates for your device. File name: %1$s for Update information Update info The latest system update is: Last checked on: %1$s A new system update is available: No update information is available. Your system is up to date. Unnamed update for %1$s  version: View update information Some features do not work. The server can\'t be reached. Try refreshing the page. Some features may work incorrectly. App update available! Version %1$s has been released! at Today Yesterday Download Downloaded Downloading… The update was already downloaded. It is ready to get installed. Download complete Cyanogen OS Version Cyanogen Update Tracker Download Error CLOSE The downloaded update is corrupt! Please try downloading it again. It looks like there is no storage available on your device. If you have an SD card, please make sure your device is not connected to a PC and make sure the SD card is working. A network error occurred while downloading the update. Please make sure your Internet connection works and try downloading it again. RETRY There is no SD card present in your device. Please insert an SD card into your device. After you have done so, try downloading the update again. There is insufficient storage space available on your device to download the update. Please remove some files and try downloading it again. Download failed Your update will be downloaded in the background… Your download may be stuck. Try re-downloading the update… Your download will start soon… Tap Download again to download the update. %1$d%%, about %2$d hours remaining %1$d%%, less than a minute remaining %1$d%%, about %2$d minutes remaining %1$d%%, about 1 hour remaining %1$d%%, about a minute remaining %1$d%%, a few seconds remaining %1$d%%, calculating time remaining… 100%, Verifying file… %1$d MB Cyanogen OS Update Verifying… File is damaged Your download will now be verified… Waiting for a network connection… Waiting for a Wi-Fi connection… Your download will re-start soon… Settings Device Error saving your settings. Please go back and select your device / update method again. An incremental update can only be installed if you were running the latest system software version before this update was released.\n\nA full update can be always be installed - regardless of the current system software version running on your device. Explanation of the update methods] Choose your device and update method: Send me a notification when a: Critical message is available System update is available New device is supported Your settings are automatically saved. Show messages in the app when: There\'s news or a warning An app update is available Hide the download button when: My system is up to date Update method FAQ FAQ No connection. You\'ll need a working connection to view the FAQ page. Welcome start app Welcome to Cyanogen update tracker! This app will allow you to:\n\n- Download the latest system updates for your Cyanogen OS powered device, early after release\n\n-Update a rooted device\n\n- Fix issues that cause updates not to appear on your device\n\n- View what\'s new in the system software you are currently using\n\n- View some technical information about your device\n\nSwipe to the left to continue. Choose your device: The device to receive updates for is usually automatically detected and selected above. If not, select your device above.\n\nSwipe to the left to continue. Choose your update method: Usually, the incremental update is the right choice here, because it offers much faster and smaller downloads.\n\nIf you are using a rooted device, or use a very old Android version (e.g. you want to update from Android 4.4.4 to Android 6.0.1), or don\'t know if you are rooted or on a very old version, select Full update.\n\nSwipe to the left to continue. You are ready to go! Enjoy using this app!\n\nYou can always change your settings later on. To do so: Tap the three dots in the top right corner, and tap on \"Settings\". Install Install guide Close Installation Guide Contextual image. Please tap on a lower place on the screen to hear the install guide. Download the update - It\'s recommended to write all steps down, as you\'ll need to power off your device during the installation of the update.\n\n- Press the Download button to start downloading the update.\n\n- The download progress will appear in the app, and as a notification in your notifications screen.\n\n- When the download has finished, you\'ll see a notification with the text \"Download complete\".\n\nIf a download error occurred, open the app and try to downloading the update again. If this doesn\'t work, make sure you have a working connection. Otherwise, contact the developer of the app. You can do this by visiting the \"My apps\" section of the Google Play Store. Enter Recovery Mode - First, power off your device.\n\n- Then, press both the power and the volume down buttons at the same time.\n\n- Your device will now start in Recovery Mode. Wait until you see the recovery menu on your screen. Apply the downloaded update - Within the recovery menu, tap on (or use the volume buttons to navigate and the power button to select) \"Apply Update\".\n\n- Next, tap on \"Choose from Internal Storage\" or \"Choose from Emulated\", depending on which option is visible.\n\n- Now, select \"0\", if visible. If \"0\" is not visible, continue to the next step.\n\n- Next, scroll down using the volume down key until you find a row with the text \"Download\". \n\n- Tap on \"Download\", and tap on the \".zip\" file with the file name shown within the app. (Usually, this is a file starting with \"cm-\").\n\n- Installation of the update will start automatically. Restart your device - When the installation of the update is finished, you\'ll be back at the Recovery Menu. Within the recovery menu, tap on \"Reboot System Now\".\n\n- Your device will show the Cyanogen logo for a long time while it is starting up.\n\n- Afterwards, you\'ll see a white message with the title \"Android is upgrading\", while your apps are being optimized. Done. Enjoy the new Cyanogen OS version! - After your device has finished optimizing its apps, the update has been successfully installed.\nTo verify this, you can check the current version of your system as following:\n\n- Go to Settings, tap on \"About Phone\", and check the Cyanogen OS Version.\n\n- If you like this app, give it 5 stars at Google Play! Amount of RAM: Processor Frequency: Cyanogen OS version: %1$s %2$s %1$s GHz Device information Device info Device image Incremental OS version: Android version: Security patch date: Serial number: System on a Chip: unknown Your device: About this app The ultimate tool for Cyanogen OS updates. This app is written by Arjan Vlek.\n\nThis app is inspired by a website (cyanogen-ota-bacon.somee.com), which provided similar functionality but no longer works. This app aims to be a nice follow-up, attempting to be more user-friendly and to offer some additional features, like notifications.\n\n\nPlease note, this is not an official Cyanogen application. \nCyanogen and Cyanogen OS are registered trademarks of Cyanogen Inc. \nAndroid, Google, Google Play and the Google Play logo are registered trademarks of Google Inc. \nThis app uses data from Cyanogen to show update information.\n\nIf you like this app, please rate it on Google play now: Rate on Google Play Version: %1$s New device released! The is now supported! Open the app to choose this device. A new version is available for your Open the app to download the update. Version is now available for the Help At the top right you can find the menu. From there, you can go to the settings, the FAQ page or this Help screen. In the settings, you can re-select your device, update method and select which notifications to receive. If you want to install a new update, start by tapping on the Download button.\nWhen the update is downloaded, read the Install Guide to learn how to install it.\n\nIf your device is up to date, you can tap on \"View Update Information\" to read what\'s new in the software you are currently using.\n\nSwipe to the left or tap on \"Device Info\" to view some technical specifications of your device. Download size of the update. Cancels downloading the current update when tapped. How to use this app: If a new update is available, it\'s version number, new features and download size are displayed on the main screen. Used icons: Oh no! This version of the app is outdated. It\'s time to update it! Tap on \"Google Play\" below. Within Google Play, tap on \"Update\". No connection Failed to obtain update information. Please make sure you have a working connection. The app will now close. Retry Exit Google Play No connection. Server maintenance Please wait. The server will be available very soon. Failed to enable notifications. Fully close the app, and start it again after waiting a few minutes. Reload You can\'t rate the app, because the Google Play Store is missing on your device. Unofficial CyanogenMod version An unofficial version of CyanogenMod was found on your device.\nThis app only supports devices running official versions of CyanogenMod.\n\nIf you\'d like to install an official CyanogenMod version on your device, tap the button below to navigate to the CyanogenMod download page.\n\nNOTE: Not all devices are supported by CyanogenMod. Some devices only have unofficial CyanogenMod versions available. These devices are not supported in this app. CyanogenMod Download Page CyanogenMod is not installed Your device has currently no CyanogenMod or Cyanogen OS ROM installed.\nThis app supports devices running CyanogenMod 10.1 or newer, and Cyanogen OS devices.\n\nIf you\'d like to install CyanogenMod on your device, tap the button below to view the installation instructions. CyanogenMod Installation Guide Update already downloaded You have already downloaded this update, but not yet installed it. Tap on \"Close\" to close this message, then tap on \"Install Guide\" to view how to install this update. Tap on \"Delete\" to permanently delete the file. Delete Unsupported device It looks like your device is not running Cyanogen OS. Please note that you can only install system updates on devices running Cyanogen OS. \n\nOther devices, including devices running CyanogenMod (Custom ROM) are currently not supported.
